Title: Root out the Hu Feng counter-revolutionary clique exhibition cartoons 18
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Most of the cartoons of a set of 20 posters, published during the anti-Hu Feng movement, cannot be linked to any of the 17 designers mentioned on the opening sheet.In poster Nr. 18, a complacent newspaper reader, a cadre, in the top bunkbed, asserts that the "Hu Feng clique" has been thoroughly exposed; in the lower bunkbed, however, Hu Feng, or an associate, slips a piece of poisonous writing in the former's coat pocket.
